text: A few days before the start of the season in the NLO, the Athletic club midlands have sent out midfielder Abel Zaki, 20, on loan to NLO side Tudun wada fc for the coming season. Before that, he extended his contract with  by ACM one year until the summer of 2024...
title: ABEL ZAKI JOINS TUDUN WADA FC ON LOAN

text: The athletic club midlands womens handball team met up in ACM PARK on Monday to mark the start of their preseason preparations. The ACM players who are in Lagos on Olympic duty will join the team at a later date.
title: HANDBALL WOMEN STARTS SEASON PREPARATION

text: This year, the ACM first-team squad will once   again spend a week in Jos, from 23 to 31 February, to prepare for the upcoming season. As part of the training camp, ACM will play friendly matches against Zeal minds FC and Likeminds FC. The fan representatives...
title: FAN INFORMATION FOR TRAINING CAMP IN JOS

text: We are Athletic club Midlands! As ACM fans,this is the message you take out into the world. With the new globe collection, you are sending a very special burgundy and yellow greeting to the planet. The includes hoodies and T-shirts for men and women with...
title: OUR GLOBE COLLECTION
